metadata.name: Transition
metadata.description:
Abstract and figurative cohabit in the same space but not in the same time.
This piece is about one hour long and it mutates from a completely abstract view to a totally figurative interpretation of the same image.

The classic concept of video format 'frames per second' can be broken inside Gif giving born the concept of 'seconds per frame' so the time of each frame can be selected by the creator.

In this case, the first 17 frames last for 3,2 minutes each one, so during 54,4 minutes the piece evolves.
When it reaches its final figurative form the loop appears only for one time (3,12 seconds, easy to extract/seamless loop) and starts again.

The final figurative loop will be sent if requested.

Photography / Video Edition / Gif
1365 × 1024 / 85 frames / 12 MB / 55 Minutes

Part of 'Seconds per frame' series. (SPF).
